What We Offer

local_shipping

Pickups and Deliveries

We collect from your home, office or any location and deliver to anywhere on this beautiful island.

lightbulb_outline

Utility bill payments

Skip the line, whether it’s to SurePay or any other utility company, your bills will be paid in by us.

account_balance

N.I.S payments

Keep up to date with your contributions or have a sickness benefit form dropped off.

payment

B.R.A payments

Driver’s license, P.A.Y.E, Corp tax, Land tax and this list goes on.

local_hospital

Collection of medication

Give us a call, no return fees you just pay for collection.

star_border

Special Services

Collection of cheques, Bulk mail, P.O Box clearance, Invitations

Our Customers

We have been using their services for just over three years now and we do not know what we would do without them. Markev has allowed us to be more efficient by not having to be out and about while providing great rates.

— Essemm Events & Communication Inc.

“Markev Couriers, our trusted delivery service provider who ensures that our customers receive their dashcam orders intact and on time.
